name: UnHeimlich 3rd Act
description:
UnHeimlich, 3rd Act

If Heimlich had originally set itself as a project dedicated to intimacy, the familiarity of domestic spaces, in his third incarnation it is transformed into Unheimlich, that is the uncnanny, and takes as the subject a house that is however alien, that disturbs, devoided of what would allow it to be perceived as one's own.

She shows herdelf empty, leaving only a few objects the function of distant echoes of a now lost familiarity, sterile testimonies belonging to another time.. or space.
